metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45898 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The Linux kernel before 6.5.4 has an es1 use-after-free infs/ext4/extents_status.c, related to ext4_es_insert_extent.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45898` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-14-generic - 6.5.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-14-generic - 6.5.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-14-generic-64k - 6.5.0-14.14
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1011-aws - 6.5.0-1011.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-azure - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-gcp - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-14-lowlatency - 6.5.0-14.14.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-14-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-14.14.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1013-oracle - 6.5.0-1013.13
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1008-raspi - 6.5.0-1008.11
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-starfive - 6.5.0-1005.6
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1007-laptop - 6.5.0-1007.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-14.14').
linux-aws package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1011.11').
linux-azure package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1010.10').
linux-gcp package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1010.10').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-14.14.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1013.13').
linux-raspi package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1008.11').
linux-starfive package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1005.6').
linux-laptop package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1007.10').
